summary: Implements a benchmark that constructs and trains a relational graph convolutional network for entity classification on heterogeneous, multi‑relational graphs, featuring a type‑specific embedding layer and configurable hidden layers, basis decomposition, dropout, and optional self‑loops.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation to evaluate the accuracy and performance of RGCN models on node classification tasks, facilitating research comparisons and performance benchmarking.
